products.title: Splash Brittany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash brittany blue is a chic soft blue vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this blue vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Bright Orange 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash bright orange is a bright and rustic orange vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this orange vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Blush Pink 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash blush pink vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant fabric with a beautiful pnk hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Splash dark grey vertical blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash mid grey vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish, the mid grey fabric is a beautiful cool grey colour. This will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window, especially kitchen or bathroom windows. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.
